test_should_create_message()

[Source]

    # File ../../../test/functional/messages_controller_test.rb, line 69
69:   def test_should_create_message
70:     message_count = Message.count
71:     login_as("sam")
72:     post :create, :user_id => users(:sam), :message => {:recipient => 'abby', :subject => "hi", :body => "Abby, how was school today?"}
73:     assert_response :redirect
74:     assert_redirected_to outbox_user_messages_path
75:     assert_equal message_count + 1, Message.count
76:   end
test_should_delete_received_message()

[Source]

    # File ../../../test/functional/messages_controller_test.rb, line 78
78:   def test_should_delete_received_message
79:     message_pre_delete_state = Message.find(messages(:abby_to_sam_1))
80:     login_as("sam")
81:     delete :destroy, :user_id => users(:sam), :id => messages(:abby_to_sam_1)
82:     assert_response :redirect
83:     message_post_delete_state = Message.find(messages(:abby_to_sam_1))
84:     assert_not_equal message_pre_delete_state.receiver_deleted, message_post_delete_state.receiver_deleted
85:   end
